title: M.S Cuplock
description: A modular scaffolding system designed for speed, strength, and versatility. Used widely for construction, formwork, and maintenance operations.

variants.name: Vertical
variants.description: Durable MS Cuplock Standards providing maximum load-bearing strength and stability on tall structures.
features: Ideal for tall and heavy-duty scaffolding

variants.name: Ledger
variants.description: High-strength ledgers offering horizontal support and alignment in modular scaffolding systems.

variants.name: U Jack
variants.description: Precision-threaded adjustable U Jack for accurate leveling and height adjustment in scaffolding systems.

variants.name: Base Jack
variants.description: Adjustable base jack providing a stable foundation for scaffolding on uneven surfaces.

title: Aluminium Formwork
description: Lightweight yet strong aluminum panels used for fast and efficient casting of walls and slabs with precision and durability.

variants.name: Slab Panel
variants.description: Durable Mivan panels ensuring precision, speed, and smooth concrete finishes.

variants.name: Wall Panel
variants.description: Robust panels designed for consistent and precise wall casting.

title: MS Pipes & Channels
description: Heavy-duty pipes and channels ideal for scaffolding, bracing, and fabrication use, ensuring long-lasting performance.

variants.name: Round Pipe
variants.description: Heavy-duty round pipes suitable for scaffolding and general construction use.
features: Suitable for structural and industrial use
Available in multiple sizes and thicknesses

variants.name: C Channel
variants.description: Durable MS C Channels used for framing, reinforcement, and support structures.

title: Miscellaneous Equipment
description: Additional site essentials like H Frames and Walkway Jali ensuring safety and convenience during construction.

variants.name: Walkway Jali
variants.description: Anti-slip galvanized MS walkway jali for safe and stable movement at construction sites.

variants.name: H Frame
variants.description: Rigid MS H Frame for plastering, painting, and fa√ßade work.
